goals.active: Join your krewe to compete in the Snaff Prize competition.
goals.complete: My krewe's Interspatial Translocator won us the Snaff Prize, but the Inquest claimed we had stolen their designs. Councillor Flax let us keep the victory, but he gave our invention to the Inquest until an official inquiry could be conducted. Zojja spoke up for us, but to no avail. We refused to take this lying down, and with Zojja's help, we headed out to to reclaim our krewe's property.
